sentences.sContent: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.sCn: 是的。 是一个熟练的弓箭手拯救了地球。

sentences.sContent: Historians say Leonardo was one of the most skillful lyre players in all of Italy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Historians say Leonardo was one of the most skillful lyre players in all of Italy.
sentences.sCn: 历史学家说，莱昂纳多在意大利的最熟练的七弦琴球员之一。

sentences.sContent: With skillful manipulation of illumination and the solid-void relationship, the overall effect achieved is a harmonious integration between architecture and nature.
sentences.sContent_eng: With skillful manipulation of illumination and the solid-void relationship, the overall effect achieved is a harmonious integration between architecture and nature.
sentences.sCn: 该建筑有着光线的巧妙处理和结实体块的关系，整个效果实现是建筑和自然间的和谐综合。

words.tran: 熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的
（英）熟练的；灵巧的；技术好的（等于skillful）
